Lets prevent import cycles and redundant logic.

com·mon
/ˈkämən/
adjective
1. occurring, found, or done often; prevalent.

This repository contains all common code for the tile38-cloud project. 
NOTE: Sub-packages should only be included here if they are used in at least 2 other packages. Any less isn't enough to be considered common. Until it's used 2 times, it should not be here.
